item.title: Thingmonk 2017: What the M2M granpas can teach to the IoT kids
Notes: X.509 Certificates and the Internet-of-Things
item.description: Today most of IoT/M2M applications are using passwords, pre-shared keys or maybe no security for device communications.

item.title: The 4 Elements of Internet-of-Things Security
item.description: The Internet of Things (IoT) is fascinating: it is a game changer for health-care, connected homes and cities, ground transportation, and many other domains.
